about_the_game:
The game is a Macro Data Refinement terminal simulator with installed a puzzle game - Shapes. This is the favorite game of the assistant director of the Macro Data Refinement Department, in which the goal is to arrange successive layers of the same shapes. Will you be able to beat Miss H's record?

Press each shape to drop into the slot. If you fill all the slots at the bottom, you will unlock the next level. Some shapes can disappear - find the way they disappear, move and reveal themselves in the upper slots. Solve the skill puzzle using your mind, observation and memory. Discover a new, fun way to relax. We love you and believe that the game will provide you with a lot of entertainment before and after work.

  • 7 levels with different shapes

  • 7 puzzles with the goal of filling all the slots with shapes

  • different actions of shapes to reveal

  • unlock 7 levels by beating the previous level

  • gain access to the last level

  • Steam achievements for all levels and lines of shapes

name: Macro Data Refinement Simulator: Shapes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish
